channel.title: Science on Fran Copelli
channel.description: Recent content in Science on Fran Copelli

item.title: Conference Presentations
item.description: Copelli, F. (May, 2020). EEG analysis of the mirror neuron system in humans. Oral presentation via Zoom for the bimonthly meeting of the Applied Cognitive Neuroscience Group. Psychology Dept., Ryerson University, Toronto, ON. Copelli, F. (May, 2020). Investigating involvement of the action-observation network in audition using EEG. Oral presentation at the 4th Meeting of the Toronto Auditory Research Group. Toronto, ON. [Conference cancelled due to COVID19] Good, A., Copelli, F., Pachete, A.

item.title: Work Experience
item.description: Research lab manager | Ryerson University | Sept. 2016 – Present. Science of Music, Auditory Research, and Technology (SMART) Lab         Project manager of SingWell Canada | May 2018 – Present         Assistant Manuscript Coordinator of AIRS Volume I | May 2019 – March 2020 Research assistant | McMaster University | May 2016 – Apr. 2017.
